short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add images to your books, wherever you are

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save whatever you like online. 
 
This plugin will allow you to easily save any idea you find on the internet.

Plugin for importing images to your snaps2u.com micro-shop wherever you are on the web. 

Take the cursor over an image and click on the tool to add it to one of your shops. Or right click the image and select the Snaps Logo to add to one of your shops
